remarks: Equivalent expressions for a 1-dim subspace (ray) of functionals. (Contributed by NM, 24-Oct-2014.)
statement:
ldual1dim.f $e |- F = ( LFnl ` W ) $.
ldual1dim.l $e |- L = ( LKer ` W ) $.
ldual1dim.d $e |- D = ( LDual ` W ) $.
ldual1dim.n $e |- N = ( LSpan ` D ) $.
ldual1dim.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. LVec ) $.
ldual1dim.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. F ) $.
ldual1dim $p |- ( ph -> ( N ` { G } ) = { g e. F | ( L ` G ) C_ ( L ` g ) } ) $.
$d D g $.
$d G g $.
$d N g $.
$d g ph $.
